level.heading: Discharge of pollutants prohibited; exception.
level.text: Except as provided in ยง 8-103.06, no person shall discharge a pollutant to the waters of the District.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-188
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-188, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 8-103.01.
